title: Images and patchy communications reveal devastation in Tonga after tsunami unleashed by massive volcano eruption
content:
1. Images and patchy communications reveal devastation in Tonga after tsunami unleashed by massive volcano eruption  CBS News
  2. Tonga tsunami cuts off nearly all island communications - BBC News  BBC News
  3. Shock wave from Pacific volcano blast detected in Michigan  WOODTV.com
  4. First images of Tonga volcano damage show entire communities covered in thick ash  CNN
  5. Despite tsunami advisory, coastal tourists flocked to ocean  KOIN.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Images and patchy communications reveal devastation in Tonga after tsunami unleashed by massive volcano eruption  CBS News
Tonga tsunami cuts off nearly all island communications - BBC News  BBC News
Shock wave from Pacific volcano blast detected in Michigan  WOODTV.com
First images of Tonga volcano damage show entire communities covered in thick ash  CNN
Despite tsunami advisory, coastal tourists flocked to ocean  KOIN.com

localize.title: トンガの火山噴火による津波の被害は、画像と通信の途絶により明らかになった。
大规模火山爆发引发海啸后，汤加的图像和零星的通信显示了其破坏力。
大規模火山爆發引發海嘯後，湯加的圖像和零星的通信顯示了其破壞力。
